incidents.title: AdamRMS database issue
incidents.description: AdamRMS exceeded server limits, so was taken down for a server upgrade
incidents.content:
AdamRMS exceeded server limits and crashed

2020-08-31T13:36:00.000Z
Resolved

Monitoring suggests that fault has been resolved by the upgrade and shouldn't re-occur

2020-08-31T13:32:00.000Z
Monitoring

Server upgrade has been completed - service is recovering

2020-08-31T12:56:00.000Z
Ongoing

The primary backup has been completed and a server upgrade was triggered

2020-08-31T12:43:00.000Z
Ongoing

A primary server backup has commenced, this is an extra backup on top of the existing daily database backups

2020-08-31T12:42:00.000Z
Investigating

Downtime has been agreed with notifying client, and a backup has commenced

2020-08-31T12:30:00.000Z
Investigating

Investigation has commenced

2020-08-31T12:28:00.000Z
Notified

A client got in touch to report that the system had crashed when they'd attempted to add assets to a project

2020-08-31T12:25:00.000Z
Notified

Automated monitoring was triggered when a routine MySQL upload test failed

incidents.title: AdamRMS down for maintenance to database
incidents.description: In order to support multiple currencies, AdamRMS is down for a database upgrade
incidents.content:
2020-06-09T22:30:00.007Z
Resolved

Build v1.12.02 has entered production, maintenance is now completed

2020-06-09T22:14:00.007Z
Ongoing

The migration took longer than expected due to issues encountered adjusting the asset editing functionality. The migration is now complete and the caches are now being rebuilt which should be resolved by 22:30 UTC.

2020-06-09T15:47:00.347Z
Ongoing

The migration is taking longer than expected - downtime duration is revised to continue until 18:30 UTC
